headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' vercel.live *.vercel.app *.vercel.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' data:; font-src 'self' data: fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: https:; connect-src 'self' *.supabase.co vercel.live *.vercel.app; frame-src 'self' vercel.live *.vercel.app;
